Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. What is more, every time I trusted her with my secrets, she always let me down. It was always the same; she would meet with her neighbours afterwards and give my secrets away. To make matters worse, people gossiped about me and tried to find out more and more about my private affairs, which made me feel embarrassed. The worst pointthing was that she started to make up false stories about me, which soon spread all around the neighbourhood.

Needless to say, I couldn't put up with that situation any longer so I determineddecided to fall out with her. Since then, I hasen'thasn'thaven't talked to her again, despite the fact that she regretted doing all that and really wanted to make up with me. Of course, I became aware of her feelings since a friend of mine overheard a conversation between Pat and otheranother girl. In spite of that, I found it difficult to forgive her as she had hurt my feelings; that's why the only thing I could tell her sinceafter we had quarrelled was: "It serves you right, I'll hate you for the rest of your life!"
